notes.title: Funding
notes.p: This study was supported by the Evandro Chagas Institute, Brazilian Ministry of Health. The funding body played no role in the design of the study and collection, analysis, and interpretation of data and in writing the manuscript. We are grateful to the Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (CAPES) for the scholarship provided to the first author (LCPNC) during her Master’s degree in the Postgraduate Program in Parasitic Biology of the Amazon.
